title: SportX TV Proposal
body:
## Summary
This proposal would provide funding to @JoelKruger to help grow the SportX TV YouTube channel into one of the preeminent sports betting content providers in the world. SportX TV helps support SportX by providing news coverage of the everyday happenings of the project, helps bring new members to the community, and runs fun promotions for the community. With this funding, SportX TV can take the next step in its development in becoming a sports betting content powerhouse.

## Roadmap
With funding, SportX TV will be able to support the SportX community as it grows and the protocol matures. The main focus will be on producing daily content to contribute increased exposure for the project and provide the community with a fun YouTube channel to interact with.

SportX TV is led by Joel Kruger (aka JSK). He has been an active participant in the SportX community since the beginning. He has acted to promote the community in many ways. With increased funding, SportX TV can expand dramatically:

* Expand the $100 DAI one-on-one challenge on SportX TV
* Implement an advertising budget to increase traffic to the SportX TV channel.
* Develop a SportX Store to sell SportX-related merchandise like shirts, hats, etc. 
* Develop SportX Insiders’ club with SportX bracelet.
* Improve the video production quality of the SportX TV channel.
* Bring on prominent members of the sports betting community onto the show for interviews and one-on-one challenges
* Continuing to help contribute, manage, and moderate the Discord server
* Continue providing product feedback to the SportX platform
* Continue developing a brand identity for the SportX protocol through the SportX TV channel.
* Actively contribute to the treasury governance platform
* Helping with the promotion of SportX TV with social media


## Key Deliverables
* SportX TV will continue producing four daily shows per week, with option for special shows and/or 1-on-1 $100 challenges.
* Joel will continue to promote SportX TV through social media and execute on a marketing strategy to help grow viewership and engagement.
* SportX TV will publish a budget proposal on a quarterly-basis to continue work and/or expand funding to meet community needs.

## Funding Request
In order to grow SportX TV into a content powerhouse, the following funds are required:
- 4,000 DAI per month for creation, salary and advertising
- 1,000 DAI per month for a promotional budget

This is a total of 15,000 DAI over the course of three months. These funds are to be paid on the first of every month to 0x037f8a750E5300293a84b05276AB7716551c9AF4 and 0xBB4057f952f92a2c8084f560d864b1e5358352f8 in the event that the vote passes.
author: 0x025b9FD9F1ed818d688e19c5F43c500bf44cEA47
